FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table dampened command displays dampened BGP VPNv6 routes.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv6 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> routing-table dampened

ParaDef.Info:
Specify a VPN-Instance (VRF) name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv6 vpn-instance vpn1 routing-table dampened
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv6 routing-table dampened command displays dampened BGP VPNv6 routes.
